document.full_text: major league baseball and the players' union announced an agreement on thursday to make belated payments to players who retired before 1980 but did not qualify for a pension.
document.title: mlb and union agree to pay pre-1980 players' pensions
lines_and_colors: major league baseball and the players' union announced an agreement on thursday to make belated payments to players who retired before 1980 but did not qualify for a pension.
